item.description:
Hi everyone! Monday, November 22nd at 7pm
Dr. Doug Graham will be coming to speak with at Raw Food Central in Windsor, CT. Windsor is right next to Hartford, CT.

Dr. Doug Graham has 30+ years of experience helping others obtain true health with the ultimate raw diet and lifestyle.
His website is: www.foodnsport.com

His major focus is on the 80-10-10 diet which is:
80% carbs from fruits and veggies
10% protein
10% fat

It is has changed my view of eating into a healthy and balanced way of eating and has me excited about being in balance and having a harmonious relationship with my foods. If anyone is interested there could be ample opportunity for carpooling. It is definitely worth seeing Dr. Doug Graham!!

group.name: The New Haven Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Dr. Doug Graham at Raw Food Central
